author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content:
If Ethereum were to do private sends without private contract execution, would this be through an upgrade of the main (sole) execution shard, or would we instead have special private shards with limited capabilities?

Is there even a conceptual difference between a private tx format and private tx shard?

author: ralexstokes
content:
i wouldn't think in terms of shards

you could imagine a protocol facility that provides private transactions that just sits alongside all the other transaction types in the protocol
